text: Monuments To An Elegy is a 2014 album by Smashing Pumpkins. It is regarded as one of their best reunion efforts. == Song list == # Tiberius 3:00 # Being Beige 3:39 # Anaise! 3:33 # One And All (We Are) 3:45 # Run2Me 4:07 # Drum + Fife 3:54 # Monuments 3:30 # Dorian 3:44 # Anti-Hero 3:19 Category:The Smashing Pumpkins Category:2014 albums
title: Monuments to an Elegy
